author: tsudmi
content: Hey, Iâ€™ve created a tool for generating shared BLS keys in a trustless manner. Itâ€™s more useful for the withdrawal key rather than the validator key as some of the steps should be performed on an air-gapped machine and are interactive. I think it can be modified for running fully automated and could be useful for the SSV. Check it out here: https://github.com/stakewise/bls-horcrux
